text: Noah Gideon Segan (born October 5, 1983) is an American actor. He is best known for his work in the movies Looper, Brick, and Deadgirl. He is known for his many collaborations with filmmaker Rian Johnson. Segan was born in New York City. He is the grandson of American photographer Arthur Rothstein, the nephew of musician Rob Stoner. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:actors from New York City
title: Noah Segan
